title: Pasta presto!
brief_description: Join Helen Baetz, chef and owner of Pasta Impromptu restaurant, on a guided tour through the delights of pasta. Beginning with how to select pasta, and an introduction to the different types of pasta, Helen then shows how to make fresh pasta, how to cook it and a trio of simple sauces for pasta. Concluding with a recipe for Mexican pasta salad, and a demonstration of how to serve and eat pasta this video is a useful introduction to the world of pasta.
